segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching as far as he can to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like nothing else matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and the woman is just polishing that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but in here, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on those cookies that he doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a mess waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
